entry.title: Who am I? O.o
entry.content:
Love for Science and Art

My name is Ankit. I am an Engineering student at National Institute of Technology, Srinagar (India). Currently I am in the last year of my B.Tech. course in Computer Science Engineering.

I love to sketch and paint. I am also a flute player. In my free time I like to build creative things. I am also a frequent user of 9GAG. Anything that relates to Science or Art is sufficient to gain my attention. I watch a lot of TV shows. I am also a good Web-designer. I love Chicken Shawarama.

Not to mention, I love to code.
